We planned to use it last year but because of mechanical issues with our robot, we couldn’t prepare our camera setup for the competition. So this is our first season that we actually will use field localization. That being said, we have some questions about which is the best system to use. Given that quest 3s has an RnD much higher than \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eLL\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Limelight, an integrated vision coprocessor\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, I am still unsure about which option is the better choice
